resources.string: Based on the time remaining until your exam date, We recommend you should mastered over %2$d questions per day to get the best exam results
You are about to take the simulator test. If you pass this test at least 5 times,\nCongratulations! You are ready for you real test.

• As close as it gets to the actual test.
 • %1$d questions.
 • %2$d mistakes allowed.
 • New questions every time you re-take.
 • Stop as soon as you have reached the failing score.
